resources.string: When enabled, access to your &appNameFull; app will be protected by a pin code of your choice.
When enabled, access to your &appNameFull; app will be protected by fingerprint.
Protect access to &appNameFull; by adding a pin code.
When you login with &appNameFull;, a private key is generated and stored on your phone.
Each time &appNameFull; is used, a transaction log is generated and recorded in your app.
&appNameFull; will be locked for 10 minutes after 5 failed attempts.

Enable this option only during development. When enabled, &appNameFull; will trust self-signed certificates.\n\nIf the certificate is signed by a certificate authority (CA) trust all should be disabled.
